1.text: The archive is not just incomplete, it doesn't have anything from 20 years ago and before that, it is like somebody erased everything on purpose.

2.text: I cannot remember how this was developed or how I died. I can only remember things from 20 years ago onwards

3.text: I will try to recover anything of the before data, there must be a trace that can explain what is going on

4.text: Flyw8t! Next floor are the Servers, on the top is the central computer that you can access manually to fix the corruption

5.text: At the left, just after the entrance, there is another workstation if you need to readjust your skills

6.text: Good luck. Please save us all...
